scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bundle && ncp appsscript.json dist/appsscript.json && ncp src/index.html dist/index.html && ncp src/email-dialog.html dist/email-dialog.html
scripts.test: npm run lint && npx tsc --noEmit && vitest run
scripts.deploy: npm run build && ncp .clasp-dev.json .clasp.json && clasp push -f
scripts.deploy:stg: npm run test && npm run build && ncp .clasp-stg.json .clasp.json && clasp push
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run test && npm run build && ncp .clasp-prod.json .clasp.json && clasp push
